# assetContentChanged

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset’s photo or video content has changed.

## Declaration

```swift
var assetContentChanged: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If this value `true`, you can use the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHImageManager] class to retrieve updated content.

This value is `false` if the asset has not changed or if the change details do not refer to a [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAsset] object.

## Getting Change Information

- **objectWasDeleted**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the object has been deleted from the Photos library.
